Report has been created at:

  • CPU: There are listed only the VMs or ESXi pools where at least one CPU MAX 10 MIN peak in given time period has been 100% or average is higher 80%,
    or at least one CPU Ready MAX 10 MIN peak has been 100% or average is higher 5%.


  • MEM: There are listed only the VMs or ESXi pools where at least one Memory active MAX 10 MIN peak in given time period has been 100% or average is higher 80%,
    or any from Balooned, Swapped, Compressed is higher than 0.
